pullrequest.title: solve issue #1082 on pid limits handling

content.raw:
Hi, I'd like to help you with your pull-request. If it's alright with you, I can offer advice and guidance to get your pull-request accepted into Gazebo.

For starters, would you be willing to sign our [Contributor Agreement](http://osrfoundation.org/caa.html)? There is more information on the link, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you have.
content.html:
Hi, I'd like to help you with your pull-request. If it's alright with you, I can offer advice and guidance to get your pull-request accepted into Gazebo.

For starters, would you be willing to sign our Contributor Agreement? There is more information on the link, and I'd be happy to answer any questions you have.
